file.name: ownership-openapiv3.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Ownership API
  version: '2.0'
servers:
  - url: http://{hostname}/ownership-api/v1
    variables: 
      hostname:
        default: localhost
paths:
  /list:
    get:
      tags: [Read]
      summary: It returns a JSON array that contains elements of the indicated type that are visible to the token's owner. 
      parameters:
        - name: type
          in: query
          description: The type of the elements of interest.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: accessToken
          in: query
          description: The user's access token.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: A JSON array that contains elements of the indicated type that are visible to the token's owner. 
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                
  /register:
    post:
      tags: [Write]
      summary: Register ownership information.
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required: 
                - elementId
                - elementType
                - elementName
                - accessToken
              properties:
                elementId:
                  type: string
                elementType:
                  type: string
                  enum: [AppID, IOTID, ServiceURI,ServiceGraphID]
                elementName:
                  type: string
                elementUrl:
                  type: string
                  format: uri
                elementDetails:
                  type: object
                accessToken:
                  type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: The ownership information is registered.
          
  /delete:
    get:
      tags: [Delete]
      summary: Delete ownership information.
      parameters:
        - name: type
          in: query
          required: true
          schema: 
            type: string
        - name: elementId
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: accessToken
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: A logical delete is performed.
